<Text: Corendon Dutch Airlines is a Dutch branch of the Corendon Group (which also operates Corendon Airlines in Turkey) which started operations under its own AOC in April 2011 using a single Boeing 737–800 aircraft serving European holiday destinations from Amsterdam Airport Schiphol, Brussel Airport, Maastricht Aachen Airport and some other regional airports.>

Text: Corendon Dutch Airlines: Its head office is in Lijnden, Haarlemmermeer.
